divs: Sighting DetailsI was about to walk the dog around 6am, and looked out the front door. I looked into the western sky, when I saw something that looked like the shuttle exploding, or the video footage of it. Only this was traveling slow, and was in a straight line acroos the mountains. I remember seeing blue and green for the colors. The must have been about 40 or so lights swirling around this object as it traveled. I can say I have seen nothing of this nature before in the sky. I heard later that it was some kind of RUSSIAN space debris?? Since when does debris travel along the sky and not loose altitude? Anyways I thought I would share that with you. I am suprised the NEWS in Denver didn't report anything on it.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Englewood
There were no other sightings in Englewood on or around January 4th 2007
Summary: Cigar Shaped object rotating burning lights, traveling south along front range
